accredited.translation[0].definitions[0]: having official approval to do something, especially because of having reached an acceptable standard
accredited.translation[0].definitions[1]: if a government official is accredited to another country, they are sent to that country to officially represent their government there
accredited.translation[1].definitions[0]: officially accepted as being of a satisfactory or high standard, or permitted to do a particular kind of work
We are working towards a nationally accredited system of training.
The data is available to accredited researchers.
